title: Bright House Networks Enterprise Solutions Provides Video, Voice And WiFi Services To Clarion Hotel And Conference Center In Tampa
text: Best High-Yielders Bright House Networks Enterprise Solutions Provides Video, Voice And WiFi Services To Clarion Hotel And Conference Center In Tampa By PR Newswire | 07/28/15 - 10:34 AM EDT Reprint TAMPA, Fla. , July 28, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Bright House Networks Enterprise Solutions announced today that it has signed an agreement to provide video, voice and managed WiFi services to the Clarion Hotel and Conference Center in Tampa, FL. Bright House Networks will provide the Clarion with Managed WiFi access, High Definition (HD) Video service, and Telephone Trunking service. Located just over a mile from Busch Gardens, Africa Theme Park, Adventure Island Water Park, USF Tampa Campus and Veteran's Hospital, the resort-like Clarion Hotel and Conference Center also offers meeting facilities for up to 500 people, and is ideal for business or vacation travelers. "The Clarion prides itself on being a 'home away from home' for business and vacation travelers," said Felix Korpar , general manager, Clarion Hotel and Conference Center. "With Bright House Networks state of the art and reliable communications services, we can ensure that our guests have an unparalleled experience while visiting the Tampa area.""The Clarion enjoys a superb location near many of Tampa's best attractions, and we are pleased to be able to provide them the advanced communication products they need to help their guests enjoy a 'just like home' experience during their stay," said Craig Cowden , chief network officer and senior vice president of Enterprise Solutions, Bright House Networks. "Our video solutions will provide a variety of entertainment options for guests of all ages, and our managed WiFi will allow staff and guests to stay connected 24/7/365 while also ensuring hotel staff are able to stay focused on business-critical initiatives while we oversee their WiFi network."Bright House Networks Enterprise Solutions offers a comprehensive portfolio of video, voice, data, cloud, and managed services that can be customized to meet the communications needs of any organization. The company offers scalable solutions for clients to expand their level of service as needed, all delivered over its extensive and secure facilities-based IP core fiber network, which it owns and operates for best in class performance and reliability. The company also offers local 24x7x365 support, and dedicated local sales executives and solutions engineers. 1 of 2
